title: "International coalition classifies 25 subtypes of uveitis, an inflammatory eye disease"
excerpt: "An international coalition of eye researchers used machine learning to develop classification criteria for 25 of the most common types of uveitis, a collection of over 30 diseases characterized by inflammation inside the eye."
